About Us
Information Package
Board Members
Administration
About Us
Our Community
Trailer Estates is a deed restricted community where 55+ seniors can enjoy a variety of affordable lifestyles. Located in Bradenton, Florida, between U.S. 41 and Sarasota Bay, our park is readily accessible to numerous restaurants, shopping centers and medical facilities as well as the Sarasota/Bradenton airport.
Boating, Beach, Bocce and other Activities
Boat lovers can enjoy direct access to Sarasota Bay and the Gulf of America from our marina. Boats can be docked at one of our rental slips or launched from our boat ramp. Maintenance services are available from an onsite marine service. Residents can enjoy beautiful sunsets from our beach overlooking Sarasota Bay and Longboat Key or test their skills at shuffleboarding, kayaking, horseshoes, bocce and picnicking.
Our spacious 60×30 heated pool can be used year-round along with our large hot tub. Showers and changing areas are available. Pool chairs are available for sunning or snoozing. Numerous other activities are also available including exercise equipment, woodworking shop, bingo, dancing and live shows.
Other Organizations
A U.S. Post Office is on the park grounds for the convenience of the residents. On Sundays, the Evangelical Covenant Church welcomes everyone to their services and other activities.
Contact Us
We look forward to hearing from you!
Read more »

About Us
Our Community
Trailer Estates is a deed restricted community where 55+ seniors can enjoy a variety of affordable lifestyles. Located in Bradenton, Florida, between U.S. 41 and Sarasota Bay, our park is readily accessible to numerous restaurants, shopping centers and medical facilities as well as the Sarasota/Bradenton airport.
Boating, Beach, Bocce and other Activities
Boat lovers can enjoy direct access to Sarasota Bay and the Gulf of America from our marina. Boats can be docked at one of our rental slips or launched from our boat ramp. Maintenance services are available from an onsite marine service. Residents can enjoy beautiful sunsets from our beach overlooking Sarasota Bay and Longboat Key or test their skills at shuffleboarding, kayaking, horseshoes, bocce and picnicking.
Our spacious 60×30 heated pool can be used year-round along with our large hot tub. Showers and changing areas are available. Pool chairs are available for sunning or snoozing. Numerous other activities are also available including exercise equipment, woodworking shop, bingo, dancing and live shows.
Other Organizations
A U.S. Post Office is on the park grounds for the convenience of the residents. On Sundays, the Evangelical Covenant Church welcomes everyone to their services and other activities.

This item appears on
Homepage
Have Feedback or Need Help?
We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of Trailer Estates Park & Recreation District. If you have specific questions or feedback about this site’s accessibility or need assistance using specific features, please contact us via telephone at 941-756-7177 or via email at trailerestates@trailerestates.com. If you have found an inaccessible area on the site, please specify the web page or element and provide any other relevant information to help us locate the problem.
In the event a page cannot be made accessible, we will work to make a text version of the content available. Please contact us via telephone at 941-756-7177 or via email at trailerestates@trailerestates.com to request a specific electronic format. Please provide us with your contact information, the format you require, the web page address and the location of the content.
We welcome your questions about this accessibility statement and comments on how to improve our website’s accessibility.
